Articles.Content:
...i'm sure someone has a mod for it.

(also my account vanished in the forum outages so i'm posting to get up to five messages - sorry for what looks like spamming)
Kerbal Crew Manifest. Lets you add/remove kerbals while on the landing pad, or move them around between habitable areas of your craft at any time.

If you're playing the vanilla game, the only way to do this is the hard way: go EVA, turn on the jetpack, fly to the other hatch and climb in. Make sure you're not rotating and say the Sheppard's Prayer before you begin.

... and say the Sheppard's Prayer before you begin.

I've got that one mapped to my [F5] key.
